### What We Do

CSGA Global (Cyber Security Global Alliance) builds open-source and enterprise MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for AI governance, cybersecurity, compliance auditing, and defence intelligence. Our 47-server ecosystem integrates with Claude, ChatGPT, Cursor, and any MCP-compatible client — deployed on [Smithery.ai](https://smithery.ai) for one-click installation.

We are the platform division of **CSGA's CSOAI (UK) Division**, a non-profit certification body focused on international AI governance standards and cybersecurity certification.

### MCP Ecosystem — 47 Servers

| Category | Servers | Examples |
|----------|---------|---------|
| **Security & Compliance** | 8 | Threat Intelligence, Vulnerability Scanner, Compliance Audit, Policy Engine, Incident Response |
| **AI Governance** | 3 | AI Governance, DSRB Defence, PMCP Gateway |
| **Cloud & DevOps** | 8 | AWS Cloud, Docker Compose, Vercel Deploy, GitHub/GitLab API, Sentry |
| **Data & Analytics** | 6 | CSV Analytics, PostgreSQL, SQLite, JSON Transformer, Memory Graph |
| **Defence & Sovereign** | 4 | Terranova Defence, QuantraNet PQC, THN Global, Space AI |
| **Industry Verticals** | 8 | Real Estate, Retail, Telecom, Supply Chain, Smart Cities, Sports, Travel |
| **Productivity** | 10 | Slack, Notion, Google Drive, Linear, Brave Search, Filesystem |

### Quick Start

```bash
npx @smithery/cli install @csgaglobal/mcp-threat-intelligence --client claude
```

### Pricing

| Plan | MCP Access | Price |
|------|-----------|-------|
| **Community** | 12 open-source MCPs | Free |
| **Starter** | 24 MCPs | $79/mo |
| **Professional** | 36 MCPs | $199/mo |
| **Enterprise Sector** | All 47 MCPs | $499/mo |
| **Enterprise Full** | All 47 + priority | $1,499/mo |
| **Enterprise Custom** | Sovereign, air-gapped | $2,499+/mo |

Individual MCP pricing: LVP $9/mo · MVP $29/mo · HVP $79/mo
